value.value: Task GetMetaData is having some issue while extracting File metadata information
Task collection between Source (STCA-LabServer) to Destination (Raw Layer)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT STUFF((SELECT distinct ',' +  'CT-'+convert (nvarchar(10),ct_number)
            FROM [stg].[Src_DMKE_CT_CatalystSample]
			--where catalyst_id like '%ct%'
            FOR XML PATH('')) ,1,1,''
			) AS ctnumber,NULL as cbnumber

SELECT STUFF((SELECT ',' +  'CT-'+convert (nvarchar(10),ct_number)
            FROM stg.Src_CatalystSample 
			--where catalyst_id like '%ct%'
            FOR XML PATH('')) ,1,1,''
			) AS ctnumber,NULL as cbnumber

value.value: Extracting files from  file system to Raw layer
Task collection between Source (FS) to Destination (RAW Layer)
Task Execute _SetFSMetaDataIntoStage face some issue while extracting files metadata information into Stage table
Task Execute FS_Landing have some issue while extracting Files from FILE SYSTEM to Landing layer
